text: election sullivan county commissioners amend rsa vi e to read as follows e sullivan county commissioner from each county commissioner district by all the voters of the county by the voters in each county commissioner district provided that at the state general election the commissioner from district shall be elected to a term no commissioner from district shall be elected and the commissioners from districts and shall each the commissioner from district shall be elected to a term at each subsequent state general election commissioners whose terms are expiring shall be elected by all the voters of the county the voters of the districts in which a commissioner s term is expiring and of the commissioners so chosen one shall serve a term and one shall serve a term and both shall hold their offices until their successors are chosen and qualified following the state general election the term shall be rotated in sequence starting with district
